name: AdviceGuru
0:
”Alexa, open Advice Guru.”
”Alexa, ask Advice Guru for an advice.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: advice guru
des: Bored of the general advice terminologies? then Advice Guru is the one you need. He is a Guru in Disguise. Funny, Catchy, thoughtful advice for you to start the day. Just ask! Note that he may not be available some times while meditating.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
